secText: Standards: LAFS.1112.RST.1.2, LAFS.1112.RST.2.4, LAFS.1112.RST.3.7, LAFS.1112.RST.3.9, LAFS.1112.WHST.1.2, LAFS.1112.WHST.2.4, LAFS.1112.WHST.2.6, LAFS.1112.WHST.3.7, LAFS.1112.WHST.3.8, LAFS.1112.WHST.4.10

Essential Questions:
1. How can we describe constructive and destructive interference?
2. How can we calculate the position of light and dark bands in interference?
3. How do wave fronts expand when passing through a slit?
4. How can we identify single-slit diffraction?
5. What occurs when two diffraction patterns overlap?
